title: Mobile-Based Mathematics Learning Organization Management and Adaptive Automation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in fundamental mathematical concepts and job-related expertise
context.additional_context: Establishing a flexible learning management system to enhance work-integrated mathematical competencies for professionals in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can design math learning pathways tailored to their work context with 80% accuracy using integrated learning parameters.
Learners can perform self-directed learning with a 90% goal achievement rate at least three times per week using adaptive content provided in mobile environments.
Learners can revise learning strategies based on formative assessment feedback every two weeks and document them in learning journals at least 75% of the time.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
